content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1. I'm new in town and I'm looking for people to hang out with.
Hi, I'm participant_2. What are your interests?
I like to read, write, and play video games. I also have three dogs and my dog's name is Maddie.
That's cool! I also like to read and play video games. I'm not really a dog person, but I can respect the love you have for your dog.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different types of books, but my favorites are probably fantasy and science fiction.
Me too! I love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series.
Those are great! I also love the Percy Jackson series and the Hunger Games series.
Nice! What are some of your favorite video games?
I like a lot of different video games, but my favorites are probably the Mario series, the Zelda series, and the Final Fantasy series.
Those are great! I also love the Mario series and the Zelda series.
Me too! They're both so classic and fun to play.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! Maybe we can hang out sometime and play some video games together.
That would be great! I'll give you my number and we can figure something out.
Sounds good! I'm free most weekends.
Sounds good! Talk to you later.
